title: Make models semi-transparent while being manipulated

content.raw:
Users often get confused by how the rotation and translation tools work. Many assume the model is being moved in the physics at the same time as the mouse is dragging it, but in reality, the pose only changes for the physics side once the mouse is released.

One way to make it clear for users that this is happening would be by making the model semi-transparent similarly to how it is when we display an alignment "preview":

1. Mouse press on manipulation tool - model turns transparent

2. Mouse dragging tool - model moves while still transparent

3. Mouse release - model goes back to original color indicating that it's not a preview anymore.

Note that there have been discussions on making the manipulation tool actually drag models/links, which would make this issue invalid. See more on issue #998
